extensionAttribute.description: This attribute displays the size of the PresSTORE archive. This attribute is compatible with PresSTORE 4.3 and higher. This attribute applies to Mac only.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh
if [ -f /usr/local/aw/bin/nsdchat ]; then cd /usr/local/aw workstation=`bin/nsdchat -c Server names` size=`bin/nsdchat -c Server $workstation totalkbytes`
if [ "$size" == "" ]; then echo "<result>O KB</result>" else echo "<result>$size KB</result>" fi
else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi
